tweet.text: Gorbachev did not know or intend for those reforms to lead to the collapse of the Soviet Union. But on Dec. 25, 1991, the Soviet flag was lowered from the Kremlin for the last time. (3/3)
tweet.html: Gorbachev did not know or intend for those reforms to lead to the collapse of the Soviet Union. But on Dec. 25, 1991, the Soviet flag was lowered from the Kremlin for the last time. (3/3)
